""Creative cover art needed!!I'm currently writing a short story series to be released on Kindle Vella called Dark Matter. The genre of the collection is Sci-Fi/Horror with a spin on technology in almost all of the stories - similar to Black Mirror or Twilight Zone. Kindle Vella only requires one image without text that will be cropped into a circle. Must be a JPG with 1600 x 1600 dimensions and not exceed 2 MB in file size.I'm looking for a creative image that will show a man sitting at a work desk (basically an author writing stories) with his face as a black hole instead of a human face. Maybe papers, pencil, VR headset, and other objects are flying around in the air around him. The idea is these stories are spilling out of my head that's actually a black hole. ""Serious Applicants ONLY!!Hello, creative writer!Are you passionate about the genre of romance? Love writing romance stories packed with drama and keeping readers on the edge of their seats? And maybe throw in a little spice here & there?::BACKGROUND::We are seeking a long-term creative writer for a Mafia Romance Series. So if your answers to the questions above are “yes!” then read on!The suitable candidate will have a fair understanding of the Mafia culture and characteristics, as we expect a historically accurate narrative.::BOOK DETAIL::We are looking to create a series with 3+ books. With each book going from 50,000-60,000 Words. We will also include a novella in the series as well. And it will be around 25,000-35,000 Words.So, in short, 1 novella (30,000 Words) & 2+ books (60,000 Words).::BUDGET::Job budget refers to 3 completed books, with a rate of $1.5/100 words. We are looking at around $2250 for 1 novella & 2 full books. The final amount will be adjusted to your final draft’s word count.Upon successful completion of these 3 books, an expansion of this project would be available. We are willing to increase the budget up to $2.0/100 words if the writing style is of high quality and the deliverables are punctual.::PROCESS::We will work with you to build a plot outline, and you will build the full-length novel upon this storyline. You have the creative freedom to divert from the storyline after a necessary alignment.Each story will be split into 4 milestones of an equal number of words and the paid amount!REQUIREMENTS:1. You must be a Native English speaker familiar with Mafia Culture and have prior ghostwriting experience.2. Must be open to taking direction and constructive criticism.3. All content must be 100% original. No plagiarism.4. The final product must be proofread and free of grammatical and spelling errors.5. Frequent, easy, and open communication6. Ability and capacity to create high-quality (NO FLUFF) stories that meet the needs of our target readers7. Know how to use Track Changes in Microsoft Word (Important to our editing process).8. Passionate about the topic!!!9. We don’t stop until a book is 110%. Revisions will be required during the beta reading & editing process.10. In order to apply, you must submit a few samples of short Mafia or related romances that you have previously written.READ THE FOLLOWING SECTION CAREFULLY IF YOU WISH TO BID FOR THIS JOB:By applying and accepting this job, you understand and agree that this is a WORK FOR HIRE and ghostwriting position. This means that once accepted and we pay you for the work, you will not retain any right to the finished products. We reserve the right to use the material in any form, whether electronic or print, and will own all rights for publication, including but not limited to the copyright, byline right (someone else's name will be used as author name), resale, ownership, editing, revision, and distribution right. You will have no rights to distribute or republish the material in any form whatsoever, even excerpts.::DEADLINE::Our goal is to strive for quality. We have 45-60 days for each project as a baseline; we can discuss any extra time on an as-needed basis. To ensure we have the best book for our readers, you will continue to work with our beta reader and editor after we receive the final draft.If you're interested, please start your proposal with “TEAM SVP," so I know you've read this post entirely and not just copied and pasted proposals.Once selected, we will conduct a phone interview, and signing a contract/NDA is required.Thanks for your time. I look forward to speaking with you!JasonBudget: $2,250Posted On: February 23, 2024 17:36 UTCCategory: GhostwritingSkills:Book Writing, English, Novel, Ebook, Ghostwriting, Creative Writing, Romance, Fiction Writing, Ebook Writing, WritingSkills: Book Writing, English, Novel, Ebook, Ghostwriting, Creative Writing, Romance, Fiction Writing, Ebook Writing, WritingCountry: United States""

content: Delivered imagine, our, store-based improvements by transforming ad-hoc tasks into repeatable, automated processes that improved productivity and accuracy for clients.
original:
Improve this resume bullet:
""Imagine our store is like a big digital warehouse, similar to those quick delivery services like Amazon, Getir, Gorillas, and JOKR, where customers use an app to order what they need, and we deliver it super fast. To make sure we always have what people want without ending up with piles of things nobody buys, we use data—lots of it.Data helps us predict exactly what to stock up on. We do this by keeping track of everything happening on our app. For that, we use a tool called Mixpanel, which is like putting tiny sensors all over the app. These sensors tell us:* What products people are looking at by recording every time someone clicks on an item.* How popular each product is by counting the clicks and how often they're added or removed from shopping carts.* Where each product is popular, so we can map out the best-sellers in every city.* Where our users are, pinpointing the cities they come from.* When our app gets the most action, like the busiest times for views, cart adds, and clicks.We also want to know our customers as if they're friends. This means for every user, say John, we'll know:* His location, contact details, and what he likes to buy the most.* How much time he spends browsing different categories.* His shopping habits—what days and times he usually buys, how much he spends monthly and in total.* His app activity—how long he spends on the app, when he's most active, and how quickly he makes decisions to add things to his cart and check out.All of this information needs to be easy to understand at a glance, which is why we'll use charts and visuals to display it.Hourly Range: $20.00-$35.00Posted On: February 16, 2024 18:46 UTCCategory: Data EngineeringSkills:Data Engineering, Data Analysis Consultation, Mixpanel, Data AnalysisSkills: Data Engineering, Data Analysis Consultation, Mixpanel, Data AnalysisCountry: Canada""

content: Delivered our, publishing, firm-based improvements by transforming ad-hoc tasks into repeatable, automated processes that improved productivity and accuracy for clients.
original:
Improve this resume bullet:
""Our publishing firm specializes in transforming entrepreneurs' book concepts into bestsellers within a mere six months. This is made possible through our comprehensive Done-For-You services, designed specifically for those who may not have the necessary time or literary skills to write a book themselves. Among our unique services, we offer 'angel writing', a more affectionate term for what is commonly known as ghostwriting.We're currently looking to fill the position of an 'angel writer,' or ghostwriter. This role involves carrying out detailed interviews with our clients for each chapter, grasping their individual ideas, messages, and stories, and then writing the book on their behalf, effectively capturing their unique voices.We have an exciting client who is keen on publishing a book with us. Here's the fundamental idea of the book for you to review:Q1. Can you provide a brief overview of your book's idea?-Welcome to 100 Million Dollar Habits: My Journey to Success and How You Can Get There, Too. This is not just another book trying to sell you a grand idea, mainly because there are plenty of that already out there and I'm not selling anything. I have built my path in life, now I'm trying to help others see the reality of getting there is not a path that others can't achieve on their own. It's an invitation to join me on a journey I have undertaken myself, transforming my life through the power of daily habits. When you see the title, $100,000,000 I want to ensure you understand that it's not some get-rich-quick plan but rather share the key principle of consistency and showing up.Q2. What's your motivation for writing this book?-I have acheived a high level of success in my life and while many people think it's from a dental background (and I want to share a high level overview as a preface)Q3. What advantage or value will a reader gain from your book?-Not just talking high level points but actively sharing my own story and how it applied to me directly. First I wanted to do these things for 15 years and then share stories on how to get there. Once the book is written I want to use it as a template to create social media content to ultimately boost my brand.Q4. What style and narrative voice are you envisioning for your book?-Alex Homozi style - using lots of simple diagrams, stoytelling, and keep the reader at or below a 5th grade level to make it relatable to all.Q5. Lastly, what are your expectations from your Angel Writer?-To truly ensure they have read and understand the 2 core authors I'm trying to blend - James Clear and Alex Hormozi. I would like an angel writer who is familiar with their concepts, as I want to reference these frequently in our exchanges.Finally, the writing quality needs to be top-notch.---Understanding these answers will give you a clearer perspective on our client's vision for their book. We're keen to know why you believe you're the ideal Angel Writer for this project. Please elaborate on this point, as it could significantly boost your chances of selection!Your response will be presented to our clients, allowing them to gauge your book-writing abilities and determine whether they wish to collaborate with you.Helpful hint: Respond to these inquiries as though you're directly addressing the client. We anticipate building long-term relationships with our Angel Writers.Additionally, please share your insights about the client's book idea.Best of luck! (SP)Budget: $2,500Posted On: February 19, 2024 13:45 UTCCategory: GhostwritingSkills:Young Adult, Education, Business Writing, Autobiography, Writing, Ebook Writing, Creative Writing, Book Writing, English, Ghostwriting, Ebook, Behavior-Driven Development, Fact-Checking, Life CoachingSkills: Young Adult, Education, Business Writing, Autobiography, Writing, Ebook Writing, Creative Writing, Book Writing, English, Ghostwriting, Ebook, Behavior-Driven Development, Fact-Checking, Life CoachingCountry: United States""
